befungeinterpreter
Class BefungeInterpreterGrid

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              befungeinterpreter.BefungeInterpreterGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
public final class BefungeInterpreterGrid
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner

A component providing a Befunge Editor. Contains an instance of BefungeProgram.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Parameters:
out - The OutputStream the BefungeProgram will write to.
in - The InputStream the BefungeProgram will get its Data from.

lockGrid

public void lockGrid()
Locks the BefungeInterpreterGrid. When the grid is locked, there is no reaction to keyEvents anymore. That means the Content of the BefungeInterpreterGrid cannot be modified by the user.

unlockGrid

public void unlockGrid()
Unlocks the BefungeInterpreterGrid.
